description: Displays CPU & Memory percentage use for multiple processes on a source

paramSchema.title: Source
paramSchema.name: source
paramSchema.description: The source to display in the legend for the CPU data.

paramSchema.title: Process Parameter Option
paramSchema.name: processParamOption
paramSchema.description: Parameter option for process matching. Parameter can be any of name/path/cwd/args regex. Choose the parameter option as Process Name Regex or Process Path Regex or Process CWD Regex or Process Args Regex

paramSchema.title: Process Parameter Value
paramSchema.name: processParamValue
paramSchema.description: A regular expression to match the chosen option(name/path/cwd/args) of the process.

paramSchema.title: Collect Cpu Utilization
paramSchema.name: isCpuMetricsReq
paramSchema.description: Check this field if you want CPU utilization data.

paramSchema.title: Collect Memory Utilization
paramSchema.name: isMemMetricsReq
paramSchema.description: Check this field if you want Memory utilization data.

paramSchema.title: Reconcile option
paramSchema.name: reconcile
paramSchema.description: How to reconcile in the case that multiple processes match.  Set to First Match to use the first matching process, Parent to choose the parent process (useful if process is forked) and Longest running for choosing longest running process
